description: A delicious savoury slice that is lovely eaten hot or cold. It freezes well too.
name: Creamed Corn & Bacon Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.25 cup Woolies extra tasty cheese, grated

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all the ingredients and preheat oven to 170 Â°C fan.

Place chopped bacon onto a couple of layers of paper towel evenly and cover with a piece of paper towel and microwave for approx 3 minutes at 1 minute intervals to check cooking. Remove and set aside to cool.
Add all the ingredients to a bowl apart from 1/4 cup of grated cheese and paprika. Mix together until it is well combined.
Turn mixture into a slice tin that is lined with baking paper. Spread the remaining cheese over the top and sprinkle with the smokey paprika.
Place in preheated oven and bake for 45 minutes and golden brown. Enjoy.
